channel.title: Exercises :: C# Web Development
channel.description: Let’s practice adding more properties to our event objects and validating them. Create a new branch from the viewmodels . Below, we describe some new properties for you to add to the Event class. For each property, consider the following factors: What will you call your property? What type of input should be added to capture the field’s information from the user? Refer to the chapter content to find appropriate attributes to fit the necessary constraints.
